title: Assets under supervision at Goldman Sachs 2009 to 2018
yAxis: Assets under supervision in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic represents the volume of international under Assets Goldman Sachs container ships from 2009 through 2018 .
Globally , under containerized cargo amounted to around 1542 billion supervision in 2018 .
gold: Assets under supervision include assets under management and other client assets on which the bank earns fees for advisory and other services.
Goldman Sachs supervised 1.54 trillion U.S. dollars in assets in 2018 , up from 871 billion U.S. dollars in 2009.
Goldman Sachs within the banking industry Headquartered in New York City , Goldman Sachs is one of the largest banks worldwide , by market capitalization .
